page.title: 18TRANSPORT CRESSBROOK WARDLOW
page.content: {WARDLOW}is served by a local bus company connecting Castleton and Bakewell.There are 5 daily return buses throughout the week, 2 only on Saturday and none on Sunday. {CRESSBROOK}hamlet served by the same company has 2 daily return buses, 1 on Saturday and none on Sunday. From Litton 4\ kilometres away,further transport is provided to Chesterfield by the Trent and Silver Service buses, and to Lincoln and Manchester by the Lincman. Together these companies provide 7 daily return buses,6 on Saturday and 3 on Sunday. School leavers tend to work in the locality but some travel to Chesterfield Technical College.
